snippet: The oversight panel of the House Financial Services Committee plans to hold the hearing, which could include a standoff with lawmakers, on March 28.
abstract: The oversight panel of the House Financial Services Committee plans to hold the hearing, which could include a standoff with lawmakers, on March 28.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and AZAM AHMED

headline.main: MF Global Workers Expected to Be Called to Testify Before Congress
headline.print_headline: Panel Expected to Question MF Global Employees Tied to Money Dispute
